body.name: Seat Cushions for Office Chairs - Pressure Relief Seat Cushion, 2023 Upgraded Memory Foam Seat Cushion for Relief Sciatica/Hip/Tailbone Pain When Sitting on Office/Home/Car Chairs(X Large)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 23 hrs 54 mins
features: 【100% SAFE MATERIAL】Our seat cushion is made of high-density memory foam that is certified by OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100. It has undergone professional safety testing to ensure perfect softness and support during long working hours. This makes it ideal for use with office chairs.

【Effectively Relieves Sciatica】Our chair cushion features an ergonomically designed contour that evenly distributes weight, relieves pressure, and maintains proper spinal alignment. The seat cushion's tail is 14.5cm high, which can effectively relieve pain in your sciatica, tailbone, legs, and waist. Suitable for office chairs, desk chairs, car seats, or wheelchairs.

【Excellent X-Large Size】Our seat cushions are thick and large enough (50x42x14.5cm) to fit most office chairs, car seats, household seats, gaming chairs, wheelchairs, or travel chairs. This cushion relieves back and hip pressure when used on any chair.

【Breathable&Stain-Resistant&Anti-Slip】The cushion cover is made of high-quality fabric with a tight weave, ensuring breathability and easy cleaning. Anti-slip silicone is added to the bottom, so you don't have to worry about the seat cushion sliding. The removable design allows you to easily remove the cover for cleaning whenever necessary. Please note that memory foam is not washable.

【Practical Gift】The desk chair cushion is soft and supportive, and it is not easily dented. It is suitable for individuals who spend long periods of time sitting. Perfect as a practical gift for family, friends, bosses, clients, and co-workers.

【Customer Service】If you have any questions or are dissatisfied with our product or service, please do not hesitate to contact us. We will process it for you as soon as possible after receiving the email. If you are not satisfied, we offer a hassle-free full refund.
body.description: TASPGE seat cushions provide a better seating position and prevent orthopedic problems in the spine. Provides ample support for your hips and legs.Soft Breathable FabricOur seat cushions feature soft-touch, breathable fabric to ensure your comfort throughout the day.Removable Cover with ZipperOur cushion features a removable cover with a convenient zipper, making it easy to keep your chair seat cushion fresh and clean. Simply remove and machine wash the cover for a hassle-free maintenance routine.Premium Memory FoamOur seat cushion features premium memory foam that conforms to and supports your hips, relieving pressure points and promoting better posture. This ensures that you enjoy the ultimate comfort and support.Feature1. Unique appearance design2. Adapt to your hips and relieve pressure on your spine and legs.3. Ideal for use with office chairs, car seats, household seating, gaming chairs, and wheelchairs.4. The zipper cover is removable and can be machine washed.5. Anti-slip silicone is added to the bottom to prevent the seat cushion from sliding, providing stability and peace of mind.SpecificationsShape: Special shapeColor: Black + GrayFilling content: Memory FoamTipsDue to compressed transportation, when unpacking, you need to gently pat the cushion and arrange the fabric to restore it to its original state. If the fabric is wrinkled, it is normal and can be restored after cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This seat cushion is great. Ive only had it for a day and i have no regrets. I have tailbone and hip problems and go to the chiropractor monthly. I also have a job where i sit often and i get so uncomfortable im constantly getting up and walking around so i dont have to sit. But today was awesome and so comfortable. The way its shaped too contours to the body. I just wish i had one like this for my back now LOL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE This Cushion
reviews.reviewText: I have chronic back issues and this cushion is amazing. I love the design of this product and the comfort it provides. I only have one so it is used in whatever chair I am sitting in as well as being used when I ride in vehicles. I will be purchasing another one to keep solely in my vehicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As soon as I pulled it out of the box I knew it was super comfortable, oh boy was I right. This is the best Seat cushion I have bought, let me tell you I’ve tried at least 5 others but they were not as satisfying as this one. I suffer from back and hip pain and this cushion has been helping me for the past days. I haven’t had to take pain medicine since I got it. Not only do I use it for my gaming chair but I also take it to my chair for our dinner time. I totally love it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I basically sit all day at a desk for work, this seat cushion makes such a difference. It’s nice and thick, comfortable and just makes my day better. I absolutely recommend getting this if you have a desk job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This extra cushion helps my posture while I'm working at my desk! It is very soft and yet firm, I don't really know how else to describe it. If they made these for cars I'd buy one for that seat, too! Highly recommended for anyone who has to sit all day. You won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just got this product and couldn’t wait to use it. I like that it is nice and thick, the curve is perfect so it has support for your back. Today is the first day I comfortably sat at my desk without constant adjusting. Can’t recommend this product enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Keeps its shape
reviews.reviewText: I use this cushion on my classroom desk chair. It is very comfortable to sit on and holds its shape very well. My lower back doesn’t hurt as much after I’ve been sitting on this cushion for a couple hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the seat cushion, its very comfortable perfect for traveling, it will definitely keep you feeling comfortable. Will be purchasing more for the family.
